channel.title: Weird client error
channel.description:
i get this error when i sign in my account and like a few seconds later it crashes and gives me this error in the cmd
[code]RS2 user client - release #317 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=4872, t id=5224 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Daniel\Desktop\5starmodZ Client\Src\hs_err_pid4872.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

yes i have both. i will try that and post errors

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Do you have both JDK and JRE? If so, try using Java.exe from the JDK folder, if that crashes use JRE. I’m guessing one of the two will work since you say it worked before.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ok you do not understand, i can not download 32 bit java, when i try to install that it says our computer is not illegible for this download, you are running a 64 bit operation system. I HAVE RUN THIS SERVER AND CLIENT ON 64 BIT JAVA!!! BUT NOW IT WONT WORK WHAT PART OF THAT DONT YOU GET???

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Just download 32-bit Java, change your run path and find out for yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

umm how can i trust you when ive ran this exact server on this computer with 64 bit java? source and client

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It is, clients aren’t compatible with 64-bit java. Trust me.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

umm im on a 64 bit os and ive ran a server on this before but i reinstalled my os and now it doesnt work, so i know that its not the problem with 64 bit or 32 bit

Read full topic

item.title: Weird client error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You need 32 bit java, not 64 bit java.

Read full topic
